name: Ascend Internet Marketing
tag_list: internet, marketing, seo, ecommerce, oscommerce, magento, joomla
overview:
Ascend Internet Marketing Inc., is a fresh and innovative Internet Technology Consulting and Marketing Firm focused on business systems, content management solutions, and internet advertising for businesses, organizations, and institutions ranging from small to corporate to non-profit. Founded and headquartered in the Detroit Metro Area, and with branches in San Diego, Chicago, Denver, Orlando, and New York,

Ascend uses rigorous business, process, and systems analysis, project management, and creative consulting to help your stakeholders and customers identify needs and areas for improvement within your business, its infrastructure, and its mission.
